room_title: Escape room "Hostage Rescue" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: I love this place! We've had a blast in the 2 rooms we've done. Challenging, but it can be done! Staff is excellent as well! We will be back to conquer the hardest room soon!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage Rescue" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: I went the first time for a team building manager outing. Loved it so much brought family back. Staff is amazing rooms are dun and intellectually stimulating! Can't wait to come back!!!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage Rescue" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: This place was amazing!!!! We had so much fun that we want to do ALL of them. Going back in 2 weeks for a different escape!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage Rescue" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: I loved it! Went for my birthday and did the Hostage Rescue. All the clues were different and diverse and figuring everything out with the time limit had us rushing but having a great time. Will definitely go back for the other two rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage Rescue" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: Loved this place. The staff was outstanding. Very friendly. My daughter had 9 friends with her for her 14th birthday. This place is clean and the puzzles are creative. I will recommend this to everyone. Great job. I will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage Rescue" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: Went once and then had to go back two more times for the other two challenges. So far the best escape themed business we have been too. Really the best set up and well maintained facility! Great for team building or just losing ones mind! Absolutely a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage Rescue" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: This was our second live game escape room. We chose to do the Hostage Situation Room. It was my daughter's 21st Birthday celebration and they were very sweet to her.The room was very nicely done up. Of course, I can't give any details but we were impressed. We wanted to beat the record time of 20 minutes and came in close at 28 asking for only one clue. So we were pretty proud of ourselves. We would definitely return to this location to try another room. It was fun!!
